text: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark may refer to: * Don't Be Afraid of the Dark (album), an album by Robert Cray * Don't Be Afraid of the Dark (1973 film), a television horror film * Don't Be Afraid of the Dark (2010 film), a remake of the 1973 film * Don't Be Afraid of the Dark (American Horror Story), second episode of the seventh season of the anthology television series American Horror Story ==See also== * "You'll Never Walk Alone", a 1945 song from the musical Carousel which includes the line "Don't be afraid of the dark"
title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
